rows.label: bf11620100_0060
rows.name: Hey Shin.

rows.label: bf11620100_0070
rows.name: That mask... You don't need it anymore.

rows.label: bf11620100_0080
rows.name: Yeah... Since you're a knight of Iira now.

rows.label: bf11620100_0090
rows.name:
There's no danger of getting in trouble for
resonating with a stolen core.

rows.label: bf11620100_0100
rows.name: What should we do? With that...

rows.label: bf11620100_0110
rows.name: Nothing, I think. I think I'll keep wearing it.

rows.label: bf11620100_0120
rows.name: You went to all the trouble of making it for me.

rows.label: bf11620100_0130
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: bf11620100_0140
rows.name: I mean...

rows.label: bf11620100_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?

rows.label: bf11620100_0160
rows.name:
Someday, I'll die...
And just like that, you'll return to your crystal.

rows.label: bf11620100_0170
rows.name: Even if you forget everybody...

rows.label: bf11620100_0172
rows.name:
At least you might...
be able to keep the mask that I made you...

rows.label: bf11620100_0180
rows.name: ..Laura.

rows.label: bf11620100_0190
rows.name:
But... I imagine that day's still a long way off.
So don't worry.

rows.label: bf11620100_0200
rows.name:
If I were a praying man,
I'd pray this journal finds its way to you.

rows.label: bf11620100_0210
rows.name:
Trusting that it will,
I will use these last words to pass down...

rows.label: bf11620100_0220
rows.name:
a means of carving the bond between
myself and my partner into this flesh.

rows.label: bf11620100_0230
rows.name: This is how it is done...

rows.label: bf11620100_0240
rows.name: This is how it is done.

rows.label: bf11620100_0250
rows.name: The loved one's heart must be made part of your own body.

rows.label: bf11620100_0260
rows.name: That done, the bond will endure eternal.

rows.label: bf11620100_0270
rows.name: But...can this really be the best way possible...?

rows.label: bf11620100_0280
rows.name: Though the memories will survive...

rows.label: bf11620100_0290
rows.name: will they be enough to grant solace...?

rows.label: bf11620100_0300
rows.name: Though her heart will remain...

rows.label: bf11620100_0310
rows.name: will it be enough...?
